post.body: probably more of a convo starter. as networking. as like the first communication. ya know? #journchat
agreed. quite agreed, even though its seems like twitter wasn't meant for that ha #journchat
I like the way you think. I believe that if someone is educated it can be useful no matter what #journchat
MOst of my friends don;t want to read my political articles and whatnot haha #journchat
i think it might be bc i started using it to stay in touch w/ fam and friends. not to network. its hard to change. #journchat
its important to have personality but if you want to be taken serious, then act serious :) #journchat
by tweets?!? yup i agree, completely wrong to judge someone's what? credibility? by their tweets #journchat
i have mixed feelings w/ drudge report. entertaining, but is it really reliable?!? #journchat
I blog. I write for a newspaper. they are different. definitely. but bc of what i am writing, not my education. #journchat
it needs to be an educated comment that is true and can be checked out... its a lot of work! #journchat
So you don't read blgs because they aren't real news? you don;t find any information in them? #journchat
the election was by far the best part of 2008.
girl... she just needs to stop... makes me want to hit my head against the wall ha...
get it girl! if you can't sleep might as well use your time wisely :) nice chat tonight!
the journchat tonight :) it was a good one!
i quite agree.
over and over and over again.... wow.
thanks girl you're the best! #journchat

I think with blogs you have to go out and check out the info for yourself. it takes more time for the reader #journchat
